textBeforeTable: Close Please remember: just because one of our customers enjoyed great savings or got a non-stop flight, other customers may not get the same deal. Our prices and inventory change constantly. We calculate the percentage of non-stop/1-stop flights, time between flights, and typical departure times by looking at the most recent winning bids for each route. Every day, we look at a sample of winning bids placed by customers using priceline's exclusive Name Your Own Price® option. We identify each winning bid's savings over retail by comparing the bid to the price of a comparable retail ticket. We then look at the collection of recent winning bids and calculate the typical savings for the route as a whole.
